api_list.name: Reset a counter
Delete all counters
api_list.description: This endpoint will delete all your existing counters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://counters2.p.rapidapi.com/delall"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "counters2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Show all counters
api_list.description: This endpoint will list all your counters and values in a JSON format.
